mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, BOARD_ID, IMAGE_FILE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(ID),1) FROM BOARD)+1, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{board_id}, #{image_file})
INSERT INTO REPLY(ID, BOARD_ID, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(ID),0) FROM REPLY)+1, #{board_id}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = 1 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) B
SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id} ORDER BY REG_DATE ASC
